(zum Beispiel Grundstück, Familienheim,: (e.g. plot of land, homestead, home ownership, building lease)
(zum Beispiel Kapitallebensversicherung,: (e.g.capital-sum life insurance, cash, objects of value, loans, claim of gain balancing)
**Weitere Kosten** können auch auf Sie z: **Further costs** can be charged from you as well if you obtain something as a result of counselling. The counsellor can propose a motion that the legal advice aid is cancelled, and they can demand the fees from you, which were agreed upon earlier with you for your matter. However, the counsellor must **point it out** to you beforehand in writing.
**Weitergehende Gebühren** können auf Si: **Extensive fees** can be charged from you, if the district court denies your application **after the legal advice aid has taken place**, or granting of legal advice aid is **cancelled** again. In these cases, you must pay the costs of legal advice aid. You will get the further information at the district courts or from counsellors.
Antrag auf Bewilligung von Beratungshilf: Application for granting a legal advice aid
Antragsteller (Name, Vorname, ggf. Gebur: Applicant (surname, name, if was changed - birth name)
Art der Belastung und Begründung dafür:: Type of a charge and its reason:
Auch das **Amtsgericht** gewährt direkt: The **district court** also grant legal advice aid. It gives immediate information, as far as it corresponds to your request. The district court indicates other possibilities to get the aid as well. Otherwise, it takes your application for legal advice aid or your explanation, and issues, if necessary, a Certificate of Eligibility.
Beratungshilfe erhält, wer nach seinen p: You can get the legal advice aid if you **cannot find necessary means** for counselling or representation because of your personal and economic circumstances. As a rule, these are people who get constant living benefits according to XII Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Sozialhilfe“). But also there can be prerequisites for people with low income. You will get the further information at the district courts or from counsellors.
Bezeichnung der Bank, Sparkasse/des sons: Description of the bank, savings bank, other financial institution; in case of building society account - payment date and reference:
Bezeichnung nach Lage, Größe, Nutzungsar: Description of position, size and type of use:
Bitte fügen Sie alle notwendigen Belege: Please enclose copies of all necessary records (especially of your income, your property and charges). You will not need to answer a lot of questions which could delay the process. Answer truthfully and accurately, otherwise the already granted legal advice aid will be cancelled and you will have to pay costs incurred.
Bitte geben Sie unter „Eigentümer/Inhabe: Please provide under "owner", to whom this object belongs: A = to me exclusively, B = to my spouse/partner exclusively, C = both to my spouse/partner and me
Bürgerinnen und Bürger mit geringem Eink: Citizens with lower income can get the legal advice aid in order to have a legal advice, and if necessary, legal representation. The legal advice aid can be given in all fields of law. You will find further details at the court and from the lawyer or counsellor.
Da die Beratungshilfe für die Wahrnehmun: As the legal advice aid is granted to protect the rights during the legal proceedings, there must be **no* pending **legal proceedings** in the same matter. There can be, for example, dispute settlement procedures at a conciliation office that must be carried out before the court in some federal states (compulsory conciliatory proceedings according to § 15a of the Act concerning the introduction of Code of Civil Procedure (des Gesetzes betreffend die Einführung der Zivilprozessordnung)). The person, who wants to be represented at legal proceedings, can get court costs relief or proceedings costs relief.
Da die Mittel für Beratungshilfe von der: As the means for legal advice aid are taken from the taxes of general public, the court must check if you really need it. The form should make the check easier. Please have the understanding of it that you must explain your personal and financial situations.
Das Gericht kann Sie auch auffordern, fe: The court can also ask you to bring the missing records later and affirm your information in lieu of on oath. If you don't bring the necessary records later, it may lead to rejection of your application for free lagal advice aid. Besides, providing intentionally wrong and incomplete information can threaten you with criminal prosecution.
Des Weiteren darf die beabsichtigte Inan: Secondly, the intended claim of legal advice aid should **not** be **wilful**. It is not then wilful if you aren't going to ignore the counselling, and if you could pay the costs yourself.
Die Beratungshilfe gewähren zum einen di: The **counsellors** grant the legal advice aid (lawyers of the licensed legal assistance chambers, in tax matters - tax consultants and auditors; in retirement matters - pension consultants). Special **legal counselling centers**, which were set up on the basis of an agreement with the Land Judicial Administrations, also grant legal advice aid. They all are obliged to give legal advice aid, except special cases.
Dieses Feld ist nicht vom Antragsteller: This field is not to be filled in by the applicant.
Es darf Ihnen zudem **keine andere Mögli: Moreover, there must be **no other possibility** to get free of charge **counselling and/or representation** in your matter (e.g. as a rule, if you are a member of a trade union, a tenants association or if you have got a legal protection insurance). You must also neither have received free **legal advice aid** in **the same matter**, nor it was rejected by the court. Whether it is the same matter, it must be reviewed in a certain case, if necessary.
Fahrzeugart, Marke, Typ, Bau-, Anschaffu: Vehicle type, brand, model, year of manufacture and purchase, mileage:
Giro-, Sparkonten und andere Bankkonten,: Current account, savings account and other bank accounts, bonds
Haben Sie oder Ihr Ehegatte/eingetragene: Do you or does your spouse/partner pay any financial commitments?
Hat dieser Angehörige eigene Einnahmen?: Does this relative have their own income?(e.g. training allowance, alimony from another parent)
Hinweisblatt zum Antrag auf Beratungshil: Notes to the application for legal advice aid
Ich beantrage Beratungshilfe in folgende: I apply for legal advice aid in the following matter (please, shortly describe your case):
Ich habe mich unmittelbar an eine Beratu: I have already referred to one counsellor. The counselling and/or representation took place on ........................ .
In der vorliegenden Angelegenheit tritt: In the presented matter no legal protection assurance occurs.
In dieser Angelegenheit besteht für mich: As far as I'm informed, on this matter, there is no other possibility rather than to claim a free consultation and legal representation.
In dieser Angelegenheit ist mir bisher B: The legal advice aid on this matter is neither granted nor denied to me by now.
In dieser Angelegenheit wird oder wurde: No legal proceedings on this matter are/were conducted by me.
Lesen Sie bitte das Antragformular sorgf: Please read through the application form carefully and fill it in thoroughly. You will find the notes on the other page which should make answering the questions easier. If you have problems filling in the form, the district court or your counsellor will help you.
Liegen die Voraussetzungen für die Gewäh: If there are prerequisites for legal advice aid grant, the district court issues you, provided that it's not going to happen at the counselling itself, a **Certificate of Eligibility for legal advice aid** by a counsellor of your choice. There is a right to appeal against a decision of the district court, which is not limited in time, when your application is rejected. That means that you can give a written explanation to the court why you don't agree with the decision.
Name und Anschrift der Beratungsperson (: Name and address of the counsellor (stamp):
Rückkaufswert oder Verkehrswert in EUR:: surrender value or market value in EUR:
Sollte der Raum im Antragsformular nicht: If you don't have enough space in the application form, you can write down your information on a separate sheet of paper. Please, indicate the enclosed sheet in the corresponding field.
Tagsüber telefonisch erreichbar unter Nu: Daytime by telephone reachable at phone number
Was ist bei der Antragstellung zu beacht: What should be paid attention while applying for?
Was kostet mich die Beratungshilfe?: How much does the legal advice aid cost for me?
Wenn Sie den Unterhalt ausschließlich du: If you provide the alimony only in money payments
Wenn Sie laufende Leistungen zum Lebensu: If you receive constant living benefits according to XII Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Sozialhilfe“) and enclose currently valid reply including calculation sheet of Sozialamt, you don not have to provide any details in fields C and G, unless the court arranges it fully or partially. But if you receive benefits according to II Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Arbeitslosengeld II“), you have to fill in those fields.
Wer erhält Beratungshilfe, was sind die: Who gets the legal advice aid? What are the prerequisites for it?
Wer gewährt Beratungshilfe?: Who grants the legal advice aid?
Wird die Beratungshilfe nicht bereits du: If the legal advice aid isn't granted by the District court itself, but by some counsellor, you have to pay for them 15€. The counsellor can do without this payment as well. As a rule, the State Treasury bears all remaining costs of legal advice aid.
Wozu Beratungshilfe?: What for is legal advice aid?
